abilities.description: When you make a move to shoot at a specific target from a distance, but score a miss, you set your sights on your quarry. The next time you make a move to shoot at the same target, add +2.

When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.723192c97fec4fe2]{Clash}, you may attempt to turn the tide of the fight with a difficult but bold shot. If you do, roll an extra challenge die and keep the two highest. A weak hit then counts as a strong hit. On a strong hit with a match, mark progress.

When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3f5a834fa3fea5d1]{Gain Ground} by charging into close quarters with a fixed bayonet, or if you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.d9208f9b7d827aec]{React Under Fire} by holding foes at bay or parrying close quarter attacks with your rifle, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
